description: Fiery gochujang gives this Korean-style octopus a real kick.
name: Spicy Korean-Style Octopus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g baby octopus, cleaned by your fishmonger
2 spring onions, sliced in half and lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Place the octopus in a large pan of boiling water and blanch for 2-3 minutes, then drain. Chop into smaller pieces if necessary.
Mix the ginger, garlic, gochujang and mirin in a bowl.

Heat a large non-stick pan on the highest heat and cook the onion, mushrooms and carrot for 3 minutes. Add the octopus and gochujang mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the spring onions and chilli and cook for 2 minutes. Serve with rice or noodles, if desired.
